publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1149 Donald Gorrie: Democratic Accountability of Arm's Length Bodies-That the Parliament invites the Parliamentary Bureau to arrange for a full debate and vote on a motion that the Parliament should set up a thorough enquiry into how to make arm's length bodies like the Scottish Qualifications Authority democratically accountable.

S1M-1149 Donald Gorrie: Democratic Accountability of Arm's Length Bodies-That the Parliament invites the Parliamentary Bureau to arrange for a full debate and vote on a motion that the Parliament should set up a thorough enquiry into how to make arm's length bodies like the Scottish Qualifications Authority democratically accountable. Supported by: Fergus Ewing*
S1M-1149 Democratic Accountability of Arm's Length Bodies (lodged on 7 September 2000) Mr Kenneth Gibson*
